Clima App is an application developed in Kotlin for educational purposes. All the code can be downloaded from Github at: https://github.com/paveliz And you can find more articles on using Kotlin on Android at: http://paveliz-en.blogspot.com.ar/
Android Instructor at IT Master, UTN, Favaloro Unversity, Dev Manager at VN Studios
